summary: Feature request to enable setting API key and RPC metadata on the live Temporal Ruby client, allowing users to configure authentication and metadata for RPC calls.
userImpact: Users cannot dynamically configure API keys and RPC metadata on the Ruby client, limiting authentication and request customization options.
resolutionDetails: The issue was closed, indicating the feature was implemented in the Ruby SDK
keyQuote: Need to be able to set the API key and RPC metadata on the live client
